issue.title: [Doc] PyArrow Architectural Overview
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14279](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14279). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a description of how PyArrow source code is structured in the New Contributors Guide, so that new contributors know where to look for if they want to fix/extend a feature.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14279?focusedCommentId=17514574) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12729
